tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Partnerships (
  partnership_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  NGO_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  business_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  partnership_type VARCHAR(20),
  partnership_start_date DATE,
  partnership_end_date DATE,
  partnership_status VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Partnership_Contacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ngo_id INT,
    business_id INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(100),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Partnership_Contacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ngo_id INT,
    business_id INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(100),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE partnership (
    partnership_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    NGO_name VARCHAR(255),
    business_name VARCHAR(255),
    partnership_type VARCHAR(50),
    partnership_start_date DATE,
    partnership_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE NGO (
    NGO_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    NGO_name VARCHAR(255),
    NGO_location VARCHAR(255),
    NGO_contact_info VARCHAR(100),
    NGO_mission_statement TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE business (
    business_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    business_name VARCHAR(255),
    business_location VARCHAR(255),
    business_contact_info VARCHAR(100),
    business_industry VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE PARTNERSHIP (
    partnership_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ngo_id UUID NOT NULL,
    business_id UUID NOT NULL,
    partnership_date DATE NOT NULL,
    partnership_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PROJECT (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    project_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    project_end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    ngo_id UUID NOT NULL,
    business_id UUID NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Partnership (
  partnership_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ngo_id INT,
  business_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_ngo FOREIGN KEY (ngo_id) REFERENCES NGO(ngo_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_business FOREIGN KEY (business_id) REFERENCES Business(business_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Partnership_History (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  partnership_id INT,
  status_id INT,
  description TEXT,
  update_date TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_partnership FOREIGN KEY (partnership_id) REFERENCES Partnership(partnership_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_status FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES Partnership_Status(status_id)
);
